[[Image:Elizabeth Solopova.jpg|frame]]
Dr. '''Elizabeth Solopova''' is Research Fellow at the Faculty of English at the [[University of Oxford]], specialising in research on medieval manuscripts (the [[Wikipedia:Wycliffe's Bible|Wycliffite Bible]], [[Old English]] verse, [[Middle English]], etc), and works in the Department of Special Collections and Western Manuscripts at the [[Bodleian Library]].<ref>[http://www.english.ox.ac.uk/about-faculty/faculty-members/research-centre-college-staff/solopova-dr-elizabeth Solopova, Dr Elizabeth] at [http://www.english.ox.ac.uk/ Faculty of English (Oxford)] (accessed 22 September 2011)</ref><ref>[http://us.macmillan.com/author/elizabethsolopova Elizabeth Solopova] at [http://us.macmillan.com/default.aspx MacMillan.com] (accessed 22 September 2011)</ref>
==Publications, selected==
===Books===
*[[2005]]: ''[[The Keys of Middle-earth|The Keys of Middle-earth: Discovering Medieval Literature through the Fiction of J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' (with [[Stuart D. Lee]])
*[[2009]]: ''[[Languages, Myths and History|Languages, Myths and History: An Introduction to the Linguistic and Literary Background of J.R.R. Tolkien's Fiction]]''
